original_text: and they can no longer die; for they are like the angels. They are God’s children, since they are children of the resurrection.
korean_text: 그들은 다시 죽을 수도 없나니 이는 천사와 동등이요 부활의 자녀로서 하나님의 자녀임이라

sentences.original_text: and they can no longer die
for they are like the angels
since they are children of the resurrection
